assignments.description: Assignment to add assigned Product Transfer State to collection variable.
assignments.name: Add_Product_Transfer_State_Inspection
assignments.label: Add Product Transfer State

assignments.name: Add_to_Final_Inspection_Serialised_Products
assignments.label: Add to Final Inspection Serialised Products

assignments.description: Adds the assigned updated Product Transfer to record collection
assignments.name: Add_Updated_Product_Transfer_Inspection
assignments.label: Add Updated Product Transfer

assignments.description: Assigns Calibration Due date to final variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Calibration_Due_Only_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Calibration Due Only

assignments.name: Assign_Current_Location_Id_and_Owner_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Current Location Id and Owner

assignments.description: Assigns the new Do Not Use After date to the final variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Do_Not_Use_After_Only_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Do Not Use After Only

assignments.description: Assigns the Inspection Item details for inspected item.
assignments.name: Assign_Inspection_Item_Details_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Inspection Item Details Inspection

assignments.description: Assigns the new Insurance Inspection Due & Do Not Use After date to the final variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Insurance_Inspection_Due_Do_Not_Use_After_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Insurance Inspection Due and Do Not Use After

assignments.description: Assigns the new Insurance Inspection Due date to the final variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Insurance_Inspection_Due_Only_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Insurance Inspection Due Only

assignments.description: Assign Item Status dependant on outcome and next action of inspection.
assignments.name: Assign_Item_Status_Calibration_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Item Status Calibration

assignments.description: Assign Item Status dependant on outcome and next action of inspection.
assignments.name: Assign_Item_Status_Repair_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Item Status Repair

assignments.description: Assign Item Status dependant on outcome and next action of inspection.
assignments.name: Assign_Item_Status_Unserviceable_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Item Status Unserviceable

assignments.description: Assigns the original field values to Insurance Inspection and Do Not Use After date.
assignments.name: Assign_Original_Field_Values_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Original Field Values

assignments.description: Assigns original field values to Service Due and Calibration Due.
assignments.name: Assign_Original_Field_Values_Part_2
assignments.label: Assign Original Field Values Part 2

assignments.description: Finds the quarantine location parent's Id and owner to store in variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Parent_Location_Id_and_Owner_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Parent Location Id and Owner

assignments.description: Assigns to variable the Product Id linked to the Serialised Product.
assignments.name: Assign_Product_Ids
assignments.label: Assign Product Ids

assignments.description: Assigns to variable the matching Product Item Id to reference.
assignments.name: Assign_Product_Item_Id
assignments.label: Assign Product Item Id

assignments.description: Assigns the new Service Due and Calibration Due to final variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Service_Due_Calibration_Due_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Service Due and Calibration Due

assignments.description: Assigns the new Service Due to final variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Service_Due_Only_Inspection
assignments.label: Assign Service Due Only

assignments.description: Assigns the recordId to chose quarantine items variable in order to connect the single/multi inspection path back together.
assignments.name: Assign_to_Chosen_Inspection_Items
assignments.label: Assign to Chosen Inspection Items

assignments.description: Assigns the new variables to Product Transfer State in order to add to record collection.
assignments.name: Assignment_for_Create_Product_Transfer_State_Inspection
assignments.label: Assignment for Create Product Transfer State

assignments.description: Assigns new values to created Product Transfer record.
assignments.name: Assignment_for_Updating_Product_Transfers_Inspection
assignments.label: Assignment for Updating Product Transfers

decisions.description: Checks current location of passed inspection item.
decisions.name: Check_Current_Location_Pass_Inspection
decisions.label: Check Current Location

decisions.description: Decision element to check dates entered are valid.
decisions.name: Check_Dates_Are_Valid_Inspection
decisions.label: Check Dates Are Valid

rules.name: Dates_Valid_Inspection
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8)
rules.label: Dates Valid

decisions.description: If the inspection has failed, check that the next action has been populated. If not return user to screen.
decisions.name: Check_Next_Action_Populated_Correctly_Inspection
decisions.label: Check Next Action Populated Correctly

decisions.name: Check_Product_Transfer_Record_Type_Found_Inspection
decisions.label: Check Product Transfer Record Type Found

decisions.description: Checks if the permission set assignment was found, if found means user has authorisation to run an inspection, if not, user does not have authorisation. Also checks to make sure that permission sets were found and are in the system.
decisions.name: Decide_If_Running_User_Authorised
decisions.label: Decide If Running User Authorised

decisions.description: Decision to check if Do Not Use After & Insurance Inspection Due has been populated.
decisions.name: Decide_New_Dates_Inspection_P1
decisions.label: Decide New Dates Part 1

rules.name: Do_Not_Use_After_and_Insurance_Inspection_Inspection
rules.label: Do Not Use After and Insurance Inspection

decisions.description: Checks if the Calibration Due and Service Due has been entered by the user.
decisions.name: Decide_New_Dates_Part_2_Inspection
decisions.label: Decide New Dates Part 2

decisions.description: Checks what the result of each inspection outcome is
decisions.name: Decide_New_Item_Status_Inspection
decisions.label: Decide New Item Status

decisions.description: Checks if the new item status is unserviceable, if it is, the end of life flow will be invoked.
decisions.name: End_Of_Life_Needed
decisions.label: End Of Life Needed?

decisions.description: Performs an initial check on the Serialised Product to see if this is part of a Multiset kit.
decisions.name: Initial_Multiset_Check
decisions.label: Initial Multiset Check

decisions.description: Checks to see if running user is authorised to update safety dates.
decisions.name: Inspection_Date_Update_Authorised
decisions.label: Inspection Date Update Authorised?

decisions.description: Checks to see if any items passed or failed the inspection.
decisions.name: Pass_Fail
decisions.label: Pass/Fail

decisions.description: Checks to see if the Product linked to the Product Item matches the Product linked to the Serialised Product record.
decisions.name: Product_Item_Match
decisions.label: Product Item Match?

Flow.description: Field Service Mobile Flow for users to log inspection invoked from Book In, for Compliance Stores solution.
Flow.label: Compliance Stores - Self Inspection

loops.description: Loops through the Product Item Ids in order to filter and find the right Product Item Id as the Source Product Item.
loops.name: Loop_Product_Item_Ids
loops.label: Loop Product Item Ids

loops.description: Loops through chosen inspection items to get the product Ids.
loops.name: Loop_to_find_Product_IDs
loops.label: Loop to find Product IDs

recordCreates.description: Creates all Product Transfer state records as needed.
recordCreates.name: Create_Product_Transfer_State_Records_Inspection
recordCreates.label: Create Product Transfer State Records

recordLookups.description: Gets the Location Id for the quarantine location related to the base location.
recordLookups.name: Get_Base_Location_Quarantine_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Base Location Quarantine Id

recordLookups.description: Gets the record type ID of the compliance stores record type for the Product Transfer object.
recordLookups.name: Get_Compliance_Stores_Product_Transfer_Record_Type_Inspection
recordLookups.label: Get Compliance Stores Product Transfer Record Type

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find all active items contained within the multiset.
recordLookups.name: Get_Inspection_Multiset_Records
recordLookups.label: Get Inspection Multiset Records

recordLookups.description: Gets all the Product Item records for the base location.
recordLookups.name: Get_Product_Item_Ids
recordLookups.label: Get Product Item Ids

recordLookups.description: Get Records element to find Serialised Product which has been booked in.
recordLookups.name: Get_Serialised_Product
recordLookups.label: Get Serialised Product

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find the Service Resource record linked to the running User.
recordLookups.name: Get_Service_Resource_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Service Resource Record

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find the User's full name.
recordLookups.name: Get_User_Name_Inspection
recordLookups.label: Get User Name

recordUpdates.description: Update Records element to update all Product Transfers previously generated.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Product_Transfers_Inspection
recordUpdates.label: Update Product Transfers

fields.name: UnserviceableDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You marked an item as unserviceable, the status will be updated to show this in due course.


If you are unable to do so, please ask a member of the Compliance Team to process end of life for this equipment.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run an inspection in the system.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Set_Check_Screen
screens.label: Failed Permission Check

fields.name: NotAuthorisedDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to run this process.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to User that Inspection has now been logged.
screens.name: Inspection_Confirmation
screens.label: Inspection Confirmation

fields.name: InspectionCompleteDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Thanks for logging the Inspection. This has now been added to the system.

screens.description: Screen for user to log updates to safety check dates on the serialised product object.
screens.name: Inspection_Date_Update_Screen
screens.label: Date Update

fields.name: DateChangeDisplayText_Inspection
fields.fieldText: Please enter dates you wish to change, this will be updated for you on the equipment:

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user dates entered on previous screen are invalid.
screens.name: Invalid_Dates_Inspection
screens.label: Invalid Dates

fields.name: InvalidDatesDisplayTextInspection
fields.fieldText: You have entered a date which is earlier than today. Please press next to change the dates and continue with the inspection.

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Product Transfers is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Product_Transfer_Record_Type_Screen_Inspection
screens.label: Missing System Record Type

fields.name: MissingProductTransferRecordTypeDisplayText_Inspection
fields.fieldText:
An inspection cannot be logged at this time. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product Transfer object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to advise users they must fill out the next action if they are failing the inspection.
screens.name: Next_Action_Incorrect_Screen_Inspection
screens.label: Next Action - Retry

fields.name: Next_Action_Incorrect_Display_Text_Inspection
fields.fieldText: If you are failing the inspection, a next action must be populated. Press next to correct the inspection record.
